hypothesis_content.title: Low Gas Mean Reversion - ETH Price Bounce
hypothesis_content.statement: When Ethereum's 7-day average gas price falls below the 30th percentile of its 90-day range while BTC is in a NEUTRAL or BULL regime, ETH price will mean-revert upward by 3-5% within 3 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Persistently low gas fees signal reduced network demand, often coinciding with oversold ETH conditions. In neutral/bull regimes, this represents temporary weakness before demand returns. Mean reversion likely as low fees attract new transactions and speculative interest.
entry_conditions: ETH 7D avg gas price < 30th percentile of 90D range
No major network upgrades scheduled within 7 days
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: ETH continues declining >5% despite low gas fees, indicating structural selling pressure outweighing network dynamics.
